key_risks: Regulatory scrutiny impacting operations and profitability
Interest rate sensitivity affecting investment returns and margins
Intense market competition from larger insurers and fintech companies
Potential liquidity challenges due to low quick and current ratios
controversies: Occasional customer complaints related to claims processing and sales practices
Regulatory scrutiny over sales practices and transparency
social_issues: Occasional customer complaints, though the company ranks #1 in customer satisfaction
governance_issues: Regulatory scrutiny and potential compliance costs
Questions about capital allocation priorities following dividend increase
